name: Dicemancer (Foxrods)
description:
Control a Dicemancer on his journey on the Hall of Darkness, where he'll use his dices and his luck to overcome enemies and others opportunists that tries to prevent him from continuing. You might not know what he is in search, but hopefully you'll get a glimpse of what still lies ahead of the Dicemancer.

DISCLAIMER: This is a RNG-heavy game, but is very possible. As a run takes around 2 minutes,  I would like to see everyone of you seeing the end, so please keep trying just one more time :D

CONTROLS: Just click on the buttons.

  • CLICK TO ROLL DICE = you will roll a dice and move equal to the value that you got. If the final square has an enemy, you will fight or bargain with it. If the square has a dice, you'll pick it up.
  • PAY THE PRICE = you will spend live to pass the enemy.
  • ROLL DICE = you will commit one of your dices. If you get a value equal or more than the asked, you will defeat the enemy and continue.
  • ESC = you can press esc to go back to the menu. (If you are on browser and fullscreen mode, double esc to go back to the menu)
